name: acid
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets’ Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets’ Sp. Def stats.
